mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring.order_history (ord_id, mem_id, code_name, tot_prod_name, tot_prod_price, tot_pay_price, tot_ord_qty, pay_way, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{ord_id},#{mem_id},#{code_name},#{tot_prod_name},#{tot_prod_price},#{tot_pay_price},#{tot_ord_qty},#{pay_way},#{rg_num},#{md_num});
